attributes.action: Get Lincolnshires roads repaired before we lose another motorist
attributes.additional_details:
Recently in Boston, Lincolnshire, a young moped rider was tragically killed after riding into a water filled pot hole, and lost control into an oncoming car on the other side of the road. This was due to the poor road surface, this incident wouldn't of happened if the roads were maintained. Help other motorists, especially bikers by signing this and forwarding it to the Boston Borough Council.

Thank you for your support!
